main.name: Manoj Kumar
main.description: , currently working with many brilliant minds at Sahaj Software solution. I'm an open source enthusiast. I like to explore and work in different technologies
main.bio: I'm a person who likes to explore and work in different technologies. I have worked on the technologies like Rails, ReactJs, NodeJs, Python, etc. Being an open source enthusiast, I contribute to open source often. And I'm a kind of guy who says hi to dogs. I solve competitive programming and watch movies in my free time and I'm a big fan of Marvel.

education.description: A place where I discovered my passion for Software development. The best thing that happened to me are my friends. We became a family already.
